title: Ondine
description: Jean Giraudoux, Adapted by Maurice Valency Full Length, Fantasy DramaCharacters: 17 male, 11 femaleMultiple setsAudrey Hepburn created a sensation on Broadway in the title role winning a Tony Award as an ethereal sea nymph who falls in love with a handsome nobleman only to lose true love to the harsh realities of the outside world."A romantic fantasy that truly is lyrical, philosophical, imaginative, touching, sometimes humorous."-New York Post"A work of
author: Jean Giraudoux
